attributes.action: Protect the elderly living in care homes in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All staff should have a qualification that is recognised in the UK - staff who are not trained and qualified should not be allowed to work with the elderly - protect the senior citizen - they were young once and are now vulnerable and need care & sensitivity and qualified staff to look after them and meet their needs - Exams must be taken and formal qualifications put in place now - Only those with recognised,checkable formal qualifications should work with the elderly -  I am sick and tired of hearing about the abuse of the elderly and other vulnerable people in the community - the government has a duty to ensure that they are well cared for and cared for by staff who have a vocation for this work - please do something to help these men and women now.
